events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and our team will begin reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department as a candidate for the developer role based on your resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will contact you about the next steps soon.
Your initial phone screening for the software developer position went well, and we are looking forward to the technical interview stage.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview; we appreciate your prompt response.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM UTC with one of our senior software engineers.
You successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the panel regarding your problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 25th at 10 AM to discuss company culture and your career expectations further.
Your HR interview went well, and the team was impressed with your enthusiasm and alignment with our company values.
We are excited to extend you an offer for the software engineer role, including a competitive salary and excellent benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer; we are glad the terms meet your expectations.
You have accepted the offer for the software engineer position, and we are thrilled to have you join our team.
Your onboarding has officially started, and we are excited to introduce you to our engineering team and tools.
The hiring process for the software engineer position is now complete, and the candidate has successfully integrated into the company.
